effect.sun_moon: This Pokémon cannot be confused. If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This Pokémon cannot be confused. If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This Pokémon cannot be confused. If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
